## lab issue reopen

Reopen a closed issue

```
lab issue reopen [remote] <id> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
lab issue reopen 1
lab issue reopen upstream 2
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for reopen
```

      --no-pager   Do not pipe output into a pager
